PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
HAL_UsartDescriptor_t Struct Reference

Usart descriptor. More...

#include <usart.h>

Data Fields

HalUsartService_t service
 HAL USART service field - contains variables for HAL USART module internal needs.
UsartChannel_t tty
 tty - USART_CHANNEL_n to be used. "n" range depends on the platform. Take a look into halUsart.h platform specific file fore more details.
UsartMode_t mode
 Sets synchronous or asynchronous routine.
Must be chosen from:
USART_MODE_ASYNC
USART_MODE_RS485 (only for arm)
USART_MODE_SYNC
.
UsartBaudRate_t baudrate
 baudrate - USART baud rate. Must be chosen from:
USART_BAUDRATE_1200
USART_BAUDRATE_2400
USART_BAUDRATE_4800
USART_BAUDRATE_9600
USART_BAUDRATE_19200
USART_BAUDRATE_38400
USART_SYNC_BAUDRATE_1200
USART_SYNC_BAUDRATE_2400
USART_SYNC_BAUDRATE_4800
USART_SYNC_BAUDRATE_9600
USART_SYNC_BAUDRATE_38400
USART_SYNC_BAUDRATE_57600
USART_SYNC_BAUDRATE_115200

UsartData_t dataLength
 data - USART data length. Must be chosen from:
USART_DATA5
USART_DATA6
USART_DATA7
USART_DATA8

UsartParity_t parity
 parity - USART parity mode. Must be chosen from:
USART_PARITY_NONE
USART_PARITY_EVEN
USART_PARITY_ODD

UsartStopBits_t stopbits
 stopbits - USART stop bits number. Must be chosen from:
USART_STOPBIT_1
USART_STOPBIT_2

UsartEdgeMode_t edge
 edge - data received edge (only for usart). Must be chosen from:
USART_EDGE_MODE_FALLING
USART_EDGE_MODE_RISING

UsartClkMode_t syncMode
 master or slave on usart (only for usart). Must be chosen from: USART_CLK_MODE_MASTER
USART_CLK_MODE_SLAVE

uint8_t * rxBuffer
 It's pointer to receive buffer.
If rxBuffer is NULL then transactions are discarded.
Size of buffer depends on user application.
uint16_t rxBufferLength
 length of receive buffer
uint8_t * txBuffer
 It's pointer to transmit buffer.
If txBuffer is NULL then callback method is used.
If txBuffer isn't NULL then polling method is used.
uint16_t txBufferLength
 length of transmit buffer
void(* rxCallback )(uint16_t)
 It's receive usart callback.
If rxCallback is NULL then polling method is used.
If rxCallback isn't NULL then callback method is used.
void(* txCallback )(void)
 It's transmitting was completed usart callback.
If txBuffer isn't NULL then txCallback notify about end of bytes sending.
uint8_t flowControl
 flow control of usart. One of the defines
USART_FLOW_CONTROL_NONE,
USART_FLOW_CONTROL_HARDWARE, USART_DTR_CONTROL, it is possible to combine by logical OR.
RS485 mode needs for USART_FLOW_CONTROL_NONE.
The RTS pin is driven high when the transmitter is operating.

Detailed Description

Usart descriptor.
